mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.album AS album, s.lyric AS lyric, s.duration AS duration, s.cover_url AS songCoverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, s.is_original AS isOriginal, s.is_reward_enabled AS isRewardEnabled, s.reward_qr_url AS rewardQrUrl, COALESCE(a.name, creator.username) AS artistName, creator.username AS creatorName, c.id AS commentId, c.content AS content, c.create_time AS createTime, c.like_count AS likeCount, u.username AS username, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN tb_user creator ON s.creator_id = creator.id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON s.id = c.song_id AND c.type = 0 AND (c.audit_status = 1 OR c.audit_status IS NULL) LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE s.id = #{songId} AND (s.audit_status IS NULL OR s.audit_status = 1) ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
